title: Temps 1.13.7 – Monitor weather for up to 12 locations from your menu bar

title: MetaTV 1.8.0 – Add information about TV shows and cover arts to your video files
content: With MetaTV you can very easily add information about TV shows and cover arts to your video files (.mp4, .m4v). Simply drop your video files on the episode list of MetaTV, search for your TV show, select the right season and press copy. title: Minutes 2.1.0 – A simple, colorful timer

title: Video Backgrounds HD 4.0 – 10 looping, multipurpose, HD backgrounds

title: Periodic Table Explorer 1.6 – Complete reference for the elements
content: The Periodic Table Explorer is the complete reference for the elements of the periodic table. It contains over 1400 pages of (searchable) text, a glossary of terms, biographies of important chemists, lists of compounds, hundreds of scientific constants, and over two hundred images!
